summary.para: The HTTP_RESPONSE_INFO_TYPE enumeration defines the type of information contained in the structure.
This enumeration is used in the structure.
The response information type is authentication.
The pInfo member of the structure points to a structure.

member.name: HTTP_RESPONSE_INFO_TYPE.HttpResponseInfoTypeQoSProperty
member.summary: Pointer to an structure that contains information about a QOS setting.

member.name: HTTP_RESPONSE_INFO_TYPE.HttpResponseInfoTypeChannelBind
member.summary: Pointer to an structure that contains information on the channel binding token.
